select eventid, eventname, content, starttime, length, (select COUNT(uid) from member WHERE eventid = event.eventid AND accept = 1) as curperson, maxperson, (select sum(payment) from member WHERE eventid = event.eventid AND accept = 1) as curmoney, totalmoney from event where eventid = #{eventid}
